title: Griner in Russia Custody, MLB Lockout
itunes:title: Griner in Russia Custody, MLB Lockout
description:
Hosts Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss WNBA star Brittney Griner being in Russia custody, the MLB lockout, and the latest in the Business of sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
